mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ffin.menu (menu_truck_id, menu_name, menu_price, menu_detail, is_sig_menu, menu_reg_date, menu_img1, menu_img2, menu_img3) values ( #{menuTruckId:VARCHAR}, #{menuName:VARCHAR}, #{menuPrice:INTEGER}, #{menuDetail:VARCHAR}, #{isSigMenu}, sysdate(), #{menuImg1}, #{menuImg2}, #{menuImg3} )

INSERT INTO ffin.optiongroup (MENU_NO, OPTION_GROUP_NO, OPTION_NO, OPTION_GROUP_NAME, OPTION_NAME, OPTION_PRICE) VALUES
(${item.menuNo}, ${item.optionGroupNo}, (select ifnull(max(OPTION_NO)+1,1)from optiongroup c), '${item.optionGroupName}', '${item.optionName}', ${item.optionPrice} )
mapper.select: # select ifnull(max(OPTION_GROUP_NO)+1,1) as optionGroupNo from optiongroup select * from optiongroup order by OPTION_GROUP_NO desc limit 1
SELECT menu_no, option_group_no, option_no, option_group_name, option_name, option_price FROM optiongroup WHERE OPTION_GROUP_NO = #{value}
SELECT MENU_NO, MENU_TRUCK_ID, MENU_NAME, MENU_PRICE, MENU_DETAIL, MENU_REG_DATE, IS_SIG_MENU, MENU_IMG1, MENU_IMG2, MENU_IMG3 FROM menu WHERE MENU_NO = #{value}
SELECT MENU_NO, OPTION_GROUP_NO, OPTION_NO, OPTION_GROUP_NAME, OPTION_NAME, OPTION_PRICE FROM ffin.optiongroup WHERE OPTION_NO = #{value}

SELECT o.MENU_NO, o.OPTION_GROUP_NO, o.OPTION_NO, o.OPTION_GROUP_NAME, o.OPTION_NAME, o.OPTION_PRICE, m.MENU_NO FROM ffin.optiongroup o, menu m WHERE o.MENU_NO = m.MENU_NO
AND o.OPTION_GROUP_NO = #{optionGroupNo}
SELECT o.MENU_NO, o.OPTION_GROUP_NO, o.OPTION_NO, o.OPTION_GROUP_NAME, o.OPTION_NAME, o.OPTION_PRICE, m.MENU_NO FROM ffin.optiongroup o, menu m WHERE o.MENU_NO = m.MENU_NO AND o.MENU_NO = #{menuNo}

SELECT m.MENU_NO, m.MENU_TRUCK_ID, m.MENU_NAME, m.MENU_PRICE, m.MENU_DETAIL, m.IS_SIG_MENU, m.MENU_IMG1, m.MENU_IMG2, m.MENU_IMG3, t.TRUCK_ID FROM menu m, truck t
WHERE MENU_TRUCK_ID = #{menuTruckId} AND m.MENU_TRUCK_ID=t.TRUCK_ID

menu_name LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
menu_truck_id LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
) countTable
SELECT COUNT(*) as option_Group_no FROM( SELECT * FROM optiongroup WHERE menu_no=#{menuNo})countTable
